code: import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Cart(_ref){let{cart,removeFromCart}=_ref;if(cart.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"catalog",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"catalog-title",children:"\uD83D\uDED2 Cart"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Your cart is empty."})]});}const total=cart.reduce((sum,item)=>sum+item.priceDiscount,0);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"catalog",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"catalog-title",children:"\uD83D\uDED2 Cart"}),cart.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/".concat(product.category,"/").concat(product.id),className:"product-link",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"product-title",children:product.name})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"product-price",children:["$",product.priceDiscount]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-actions",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"neon-text-btn",onClick:()=>removeFromCart(product.configId),children:"\u2715 Remove"})})]},product.configId)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{style:{marginTop:24},children:["Total: $",total]})]});}export default Cart;
